episode_event_academy_summer02/8301_1001: Rosaaa! What should we play next?!

L-let me take a quick breather... I’m so tired
from the game we were playing...

You always have so much energy, Iris!
You’re just amazing!

You’re athletic, and you even do well in
school. I’m kind of jealous you’re so good
at everything!

I wonder if exercise sharpens your
brain, too.

Hmmm. I wonder! I’ve never thought
about it.

Back in Unova, I was always good at
exercising, even before I started studying!

Maybe it’s ’cause I spent so much time
playing with Pokémon back in the Village
of Dragons.

Lately, I’ve been sparring with my Pokémon,
just like Drayden does!
Maybe that’s also made me stronger?

I don’t think there are any students here who
could match your athleticism, Iris!
episode_event_academy_summer02/8302_1001:
Thou art able to fix not only thine own
clothes but also those of others?!

Yeah... Damaged clothes bother me, so it’s
hard to ignore.

I make a point of fixing anything I notice
right then and there.

Fascinating. Thou hast great skill with a
needle, no doubt.

But with such skill, why dost thou not add
more flair to thine own uniform?

Nah. I appreciate the idea, but that’s not
really my thing.

If I wore anything too extreme, I might stand
out—in a bad way.

I’d rather blend in with the other students,
while keeping a comfortable distance.
That mindset is common among ninja!

Shouldst thou be hesitant to alter thy attire,
thou mayest find ninja interesting!

I would be more than honored to hold a
lecture on their ways.
Yeah. That’s not a bad idea.
It might be worth learning a thing or two.
episode_event_academy_summer02/8303_1001: Dad! You’re here at Pasio Academy, too?!
Are you gonna teach here or something?

Well, I was also asked to do that, yes,
but I’m here for the same reason you are,
Brendan.

To broaden my knowledge and learn
new things!

What?! Y-you mean you’re a student,
like me?!

Sure am! Age and experience don’t matter
when it comes to learning!

Studying is a lifelong endeavor. Even as
an adult!

then you’ll be classmates with older students
and members of the Elite Four, like Drake
and Glacia.

And you’ll share notes and join clubs with
them, too?!

As a family, we should thank Pasio Academy
for such a rare opportunity!
episode_event_academy_summer02/8304_1001: We should have a school song!

I wanna make one just like the one we had
at the academy in Paldea.

That’s my goal! I wanna make it happen
one day!

Singing along with your classmates is all
part of the student experience, y’know?
Right?! Plus, you need one for school events!

If we make one for Pasio Academy, it should
be something ANYONE will want to sing,
no matter their age!

Totally! If we students have a hand in
making it, it’ll be perfect for our school!

We have a lot of famous musicians here on
Pasio...
I’m sure it’d be fun if we got them involved!
I want it to be super cute!
A cute song...or a cool song...

To each their own, I guess. Seems it’d be
hard to please everyone.

What if we made a Pasio Academy song
committee?

Any student who wants to could join. 
It could become a precious memory!
